nodes.text: Thisspiasian stabilizing coils were a lightsaber attachment that took the form of a tail that wrapped around the saber's hilt and helped to keep the blade balanced during combat. Based on traditional weaponry from Thisspias, the coils became popular with survivors of the Great Jedi Purge despite their cost of 5,500 credits.
Thisspiasian stabilizing coils were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
